title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8700.5 - Duration of conceptual review determination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8700.5 - Duration of conceptual review determination

State Regulations
(a) A conceptual review determination shall
remain in effect as long as the proposed business undertaking, project or
activity and the persons involved remain the same as described in the master
application project information form or in additional information submitted as
part of the conceptual review. (b) Where new permit requirements or related standards become effective after the
conceptual review determination is rendered by an interested State agency, and
the agency had no control or discretion in establishing the effective date, the
new permit requirements or standards shall not be considered to have been part
of the conceptual review. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9

8700.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
